original_title: No Laugfs Gas price revision in October
original_body_lines: LAUGFS Gas PLC has confirmed that there will be no price revision for domestic gas cylinder refills in the month of October, 2025.
This was announced by the Cluster Director/CEO of Laugfs Gas PLC, Dr. Niroshan J Peiris.
The prices for LAUGFS Gas cylinders in the Colombo District are as follows:
